options.name: Superior Tools
options.description: Lock Picks, Compasses, Crowbars and Climbing Kits you craft add a 1d4 Bonus instead of +1

options.name: Craft : Strong Start
options.description: You can reroll your first Crafting Skill Check when attempting to create an Object that has a Cumulative Check.

options.name: Action : Undermine
options.description: You interact with an Object or Structure, examining it for weaknesses by making an Engineering Check. On an 11 or higher, you lower the Durability Tier by 1 for a minute. You can only attempt to Undermine a unique Object or Structure once per Day.

options.name: Disarming
options.description: You gain a 1d4 Bonus to disarming and defending against Traps

options.name: Locksmith
options.description: You are a master Locksmith, gaining a +2 Bonus when using Lockpicks and increasing the Required Check to open any Locks you Craft by an amount equal to your Engineering Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Trapmaster
options.description: Traps you make have the Required Checks for spotting and avoiding them increased by 2 at the time you craft them. Additionally, add an extra Dice to the Damage of your Traps.

options.name: Upgrades
options.description: You are able to add one unique Infusion onto Weapons, Armor, Gloves or Boots after they have been Crafted, requiring an Engineering Check of 12 or higher or the materials are lost.

options.name: Inventor
options.description: You can install Grapple, Net and Bola Launcher Infusions on hand armor. Additionally, each infusion has its Range increased by 2 Units.

options.name: Craft : Reverse Engineer
options.description: You choose an Object that has a Crafting Recipe and attempt to deconstruct it. Roll an Engineering Check. If the Check is above a 14, you recover all the ingredients. On a success, if you recreate this Object on the same day, you gain a +3 Bonus on your first Craft Check.

options.name: Free Action : Use
options.description: You can interact with an object without expending an Action on your turn.

options.name: Precise Fabrication
options.description: Ranged Weapons that you Craft gain +1 Attack and +2 Units of Maximum Range.

options.name: Construct Crafting
options.description: You can create Constructs of the Mechanical subtype up to a Level less than your Engineering Bonus Modifier. For each Level of the Target Construct, you must spend 1 Day and 100 Gold for parts and fabrication

options.name: Master Engineer
options.description: You Gain +2 Engineering and Infusions, including those from other Crafting Skills, no longer add to the Cumulative Check of an item.
